mapper.insert: update sys_user u set u.failcnt = IFNULL(u.failcnt,0) + 1 where u.id = #{uid}
update sys_user u set u.status = 1 where u.id = #{uid}
update sys_user u set u.status = 0,u.failcnt = 0,u.unlock_date = #{unlockDate} where u.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.* from sys_user_role ur join sys_role r on ur.roleId = r.id and ur.userId = #{uid}
select u.* from sys_user_role ur join sys_user u on ur.uid = u.id where ur.roleid = #{id};
select * from sys_user u where u.id = #{uid};
select * from sys_user u where u.username = #{username};
select r.* from sys_user_role ur join sys_role_resource rr on ur.roleid = rr.roleid join sys_resource r on rr.resid = r.id where ur.userid = #{uid};
